Description:
Notice Serial Number:  IN/DC/13/111021/01   311970526
You have not made and given effect to appropriate arrangements for the effective management or monitoring of the preventative and protective measures necessary to control the risks to health and safety, in that you do not have an effective system in place to manage and monitor working at height (falls from height), fire safety (lack of fire extinguishers / fire alarms) and housekeeping, or controlling the risk of Operatives and others to exposure to substances hazardous to health (construction dusts), to ensure that construction work is carried out without risks to health and safety.
